def calculate_final_sums(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, arr) = case
        s = sum(arr)
        ans = []
        for i in range(n):
            count = 1
            new = arr[i]
            while new % x == 0:
                count += 1
                new //= x
            ans.append(count)
        mn = min(ans)
        final_sum = s * mn - sum(arr[:ans.index(mn)])
        results.append(final_sum)
    return results

    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, arr) = case
        s = sum(arr)
        ans = []
        for i in range(n):
            count = 1
            new = arr[i]
            while new % x == 0:
                count += 1
                new //= x
            ans.append(count)
        mn = min(ans)
        final_sum = s * mn * sum(arr[:ans.index(mn)])
        results.append(final_sum)
    return results

def calculate_final_sums(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, arr) = case
        s = sum(arr)
        ans = []
        for i in range(n):

            new = arr[i]
            while new % x != 0:

                new //= x
            ans.append(count)
        mn = min(ans)
        final_sum = s * mn + sum(arr[:ans.index(mn)])
        results.append(final_sum)
    return results

def calculate_final_sums(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, arr) = case
        s = sum(arr)
        ans = []
        for i in range(n):

        results.append(final_sum)
    return results
